author: fwyzard
body:
#### PR description:

Clean up `HiFJRhoProducer`:
  - merge `HiFJRhoProducer.h` into `HiFJRhoProducer.cc`
  - remove unnecessary methods and includes
  - rename data members to follow the CMS coding conventions
  - rearrange data members to reduce memory usage
  - convert from "stream" to "global" `EDProducer`
  - rewrite the for loop as a range loop
  - remove one redundant temporary C array
  - replace the other temporary C arrays with vectors

#### PR validation:

None.
title: Clean up `HiFJRhoProducer`
